mapper.insert: insert into consumer (userId, pw, name, birth, gender, phone, email, receive, address, detailAddress, grade, createDate, updateDate) values (#{userId}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{receive}, #{address}, #{detailAddress}, #{grade}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate})
mapper.select: select count(*) from consumer where userId = #{userId}
select * from consumer where name = #{name} and email = #{email}
select * from consumer where userId = #{userId} and email = #{email}
